Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TurnControllerTest.SocketClientConnectionStub
public class SocketClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
SocketClientConnection handles a connection between client and server, permitting sending and receiving messages and doing other class-useful operations too.
See Also:
Runnable, ClientConnection

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SocketClientConnection​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
    Constructor SocketClientConnection instantiates an input/output stream from the socket received as parameters, and adds the main server to his attributes too.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClientConnection

      public SocketClientConnection​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      Constructor SocketClientConnection instantiates an input/output stream from the socket received as parameters, and adds the main server to his attributes too.
      Parameters:
      socket - of type Socket - the socket which accepted the client connection.
      server - of type Server - the main server class.

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Method isActive returns the active of this SocketClientConnection object.
      Returns:
      the active (type boolean) of this SocketClientConnection object.

    • getSocket

      public java.net.Socket getSocket()
      Method getSocket returns the socket of this SocketClientConnection object.
      Returns:
      the socket (type Socket) of this SocketClientConnection object.

    • close

      public void close()
      Method close terminates the connection with the client, closing firstly input and output streams, then invoking the server method called "unregisterClient", which will remove the active virtual client from the list.
      See Also:
      for more details.

    • readFromStream

      public void readFromStream() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Method readFromStream reads a serializable object from the input stream, using ObjectInputStream library.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when the client is not online anymore.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the serializable object is not part of any class.

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run is the overriding runnable class method, which is called on a new client connection.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      See Also:
      Runnable.run()

    • actionHandler

      public void actionHandler​(Message command)
      Method actionHandler handles an action by receiving a message from the client. The "Message" interface permits splitting the information into several types of messages. This method invokes another one relying on the implementation type of the message received.
      Parameters:
      command - of type Message - the Message interface type command, which needs to be checked in order to perform an action.

    • checkConnection

      private void checkConnection​(SetupConnection command)
      Method checkConnection checks the validity of the connection message received from the client.
      Parameters:
      command - of type SetupConnection - the connection command.

    • actionHandler

      public void actionHandler​(UserAction action)
      Method actionHandler handles an action by receiving a message from the client. The "Action" interface permits splitting the information into several types of action (like move, build, etc). This method invokes the correct part of the server relying on the action type received.
      Parameters:
      action - of type UserAction the Action interface type command received from the client.

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(RequestPlayersNumber message)
      Method setPlayers is a setup method. It permits setting the number of the players in the match, which is decided by the first user connected to the server. It waits for a NumberOfPlayers Message type, then extracts the information about the number of players, passing it as a parameter to the server function "setTotalPlayers".
      Parameters:
      message - of type RequestPlayersNumber - the action received from the user. This method iterates on it until it finds a NumberOfPlayers type.

    • sendSocketMessage

      public void sendSocketMessage​(SerializedAnswer serverAnswer)
      Method sendSocketMessage allows dispatching the server's Answer to the correct client. The type SerializedMessage contains an Answer type object, which represents an interface for server answer, like the client Message one.
      Parameters:
      serverAnswer - of type SerializedAnswer - the serialized server answer (interface Answer).

    • getClientID

      public java.lang.Integer getClientID()
      Method getClientID returns the clientID of this SocketClientConnection object.
      Returns:
      the clientID (type Integer) of this SocketClientConnection object.
